meta.cmd: /usr/bin/env zsh -lic 'if command -v btop >/dev/null 2>&1; then exec btop; elif [ -x /usr/bin/btop ]; then exec /usr/bin/btop; elif [ -x /usr/local/bin/btop ]; then exec /usr/local/bin/btop; elif [ -x /opt/homebrew/bin/btop ]; then exec /opt/homebrew/bin/btop; else echo "btop not found; PATH=$PATH"; fi'
/usr/bin/env zsh -lic 'if command -v htop >/dev/null 2>&1; then exec htop; else echo "htop not found. Install htop or use btop widget."; fi'

/usr/bin/env zsh -lic 'if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then watch -n3 "docker stats --no-stream --format \"table {{.Name}}\t{{.CPUPerc}}\t{{.MemUsage}}\t{{.NetIO}}\t{{.BlockIO}}\""; else echo "docker not found."; fi'

/usr/bin/env zsh -lic 'if command -v journalctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then exec journalctl -f -n 200; elif [ -f /var/log/syslog ]; then exec tail -n 200 -F /var/log/syslog; elif [ -f /var/log/messages ]; then exec tail -n 200 -F /var/log/messages; else echo "No system log found."; fi'
/usr/bin/env zsh -lic 'if command -v tailscale >/dev/null 2>&1; then watch -n5 "tailscale status"; else echo "tailscale not found."; fi'
/usr/bin/env zsh -lic 'if command -v curl >/dev/null 2>&1; then watch -n1800 "curl -s wttr.in/Geneva?format=3"; else echo "curl not found."; fi'

/usr/bin/env zsh -lic 'if command -v apt >/dev/null 2>&1; then apt list --upgradable 2>/dev/null | head -n 20; elif command -v dnf >/dev/null 2>&1; then dnf check-update || true; elif command -v brew >/dev/null 2>&1; then brew outdated; else echo "No package manager detected."; fi'
/usr/bin/env zsh -lic 'if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl --failed --no-pager; else echo "systemctl not found."; fi'

/usr/bin/env zsh -lic 'if command -v ss >/dev/null 2>&1; then watch -n5 "ss -tulpn | awk \"BEGIN {printf \"%-5s %-25s %s\\n\", \"Proto\", \"Local-Address:Port\", \"Program\"} NR>1 {printf \"%-5s %-25s %s\\n\", $1, $5, $7}\""; elif command -v netstat >/dev/null 2>&1; then watch -n5 "netstat -tulpn | awk \"BEGIN {printf \"%-5s %-25s %s\\n\", \"Proto\", \"Local-Address:Port\", \"Program\"} NR>2 {printf \"%-5s %-25s %s\\n\", $1, $4, $7}\""; else echo "No ss/netstat found."; fi'
